content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Greetings, Aziz. Thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 400 Euro per month. However, I was wondering if there is any possibility to negotiate the price down.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz. I appreciate your interest in the apartment, but I must say that my initial offer was quite competitive. However, I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Is there anything specific that you are looking for in terms of the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a lower rental price than 400 Euro per month. Is that possible?

I also would like to know if there is a possibility to renew the contract after 1 year.

I would like to know if the apartment is furnished or not.

I would like to know if there is a possibility to move in on the 1st of July.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Aziz. I understand your concerns. I apologize if my initial offer was not satisfactory. However, I must say that my apartment is in high demand and I am looking to maximize my gains.

Regarding the possibility of negotiating the rental price, I am open to discussing this with you. However, I am afraid that I cannot offer a lower rental price than 400 Euro per month.

Regarding the possibility of renewing the contract after 1 year, I am open to discussing this with you. However, I must say that my initial offer is for a one-year lease.

Regarding the furniture in the apartment, I am afraid that it is not furnished.

Regarding the possibility of moving in on the 1st of July, I am afraid that this is not possible as the apartment is currently occupied by another tenant.

I hope this information is helpful to you. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
